ctx: intros d a0 a1 s sigma H1 H2 a p H3.
tactic: apply H1 with (a:=a1) (p:=p) in H3 as H4.
exceptions.exn: No such bound variable a (no bound variables at all in the expression).

original: intros d a0 a1 s sigma H1 H2 a p H3. apply H1 with (a:=a1) (p:=p) in H3 as H4. destruct H4 as [n [H5 H6]]. exists n. split. - apply H6. - apply H2.
